info.title: AI Competitor Insight Hub API
info.description: API для мониторинга новостей из мира ИИ-индустрии

schema.title: Response Register Api V1 Auth Register Post
Response Create News Api V1 News  Post

get.description:
Get news items with enhanced filtering and search capabilities

Returns paginated list of news items with comprehensive filtering options.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Number of news items to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Number of news items to return

parameters.name: offset

schema.description: Number of news items to skip
schema.title: Offset

parameters.description: Number of news items to skip

schema.title: Response Get News Api V1 News  Get
Response Update News Api V1 News  News Id  Put

get.description:
Get specific news item by ID with full details

Returns detailed information about a specific news item including
related company information, keywords, and user activities.

schema.title: Response Get News Item Api V1 News  News Id  Get

get.description:
Get comprehensive news statistics

Returns statistics about news items including counts by category,
source type, recent news, and high priority items.

Get comprehensive news statistics filtered by company IDs

Returns statistics about news items for specific companies including counts by category,
source type, recent news, and high priority items.

Search news items with advanced filtering

Performs full-text search across news titles, content, and summaries
with optional filtering by category, source type, and company.

schema.title: Response Search News Api V1 News Search Get

get.description:
Get news items by category with statistics

Returns paginated list of news items for a specific category along with
statistics about top companies and source distribution.

schema.description: Number of news items to return

schema.description: Number of news items to skip

parameters.description: Number of news items to skip

post.description:
Compare multiple companies

Request body:
{
    "company_ids": ["uuid1", "uuid2", "uuid3"],
    "date_from": "2025-01-01",  // optional
    "date_to": "2025-01-31",     // optional
    "name": "Q1 2025 Comparison" // optional
}

get.description: Get user's saved comparisons
Get specific comparison details
Get activity metrics for a specific company

Автоматически подобрать конкурентов

Query params:
    limit: сколько конкурентов вернуть (default: 5, max: 10)
    days: за какой период анализировать (default: 30)

post.description:
Анализ новостных тем для списка компаний

Body:
    {
        "company_ids": ["uuid1", "uuid2", "uuid3"],
        "date_from": "2025-01-01",  // optional
        "date_to": "2025-01-31"     // optional
    }

get.description:
Health check endpoint for Telegram webhook

Delete Telegram webhook
Get current webhook information
